name: Moranino delizioso
desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. With a crispy crust and tender meat, this legendary delicacy is so succulent that not even Mora laid in front of you could distract you from enjoying it.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

value.name: Ricetta: Moranino
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mora Meat.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Moranino
value.desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.

value.name: Moranino sospetto
value.desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. The tough pastry shell almost seems to sally out against your teeth as you bite into it. If you fight through the greasiness and only chew on the minced meat, you can sort of taste its flavor.
